title: STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean.  A dream collaboration between the two biggest fighting game franchises is now a reality! A deluge of highly demanded characters join the fray in this tag team-based game! Street Fighter fans, Tekken fans and of course gamers of all kinds can enjoy the new, easy-to-understand battle system. A new era in the history of fighting games is about to begin with STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN!

childDownloads.title: Blanka (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Blanka dreams of one day becoming a pilot, flying high in the sky. To help him realize his dreams, rumor has it that Dan made him a special outfit. ...He may have overdid it a bit? Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Captivate 2011 Trailer 1
childDownloads.description: A promotional video for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN, a collaborative title between the two biggest fighting game franchises! This trailer made its debut at Captivate 2011 and features Ryu and Ken going toe to toe against Kazuya and Nina. Do not miss out on this exciting trailer!

childDownloads.title: Captivate 2011 Trailer 2
childDownloads.description: A trailer shown at Captivate 2011. Check out awesome tag teams and battles between everyone's favorite characters in STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN, a game that heralds the coming of a new era of tag team action!

childDownloads.title: Comic-con 2011 Trailer 1
childDownloads.description: A trailer that premiered at Comic-con 2011. The demands of the fans have been answered, and a slew of new fighters have joined the fray! Don't miss out on this exciting new trailer that showcases an unprecedented collaboration!

childDownloads.title: Comic-con 2011 Trailer 2
childDownloads.description: The second trailer that premiered at Comic-con 2011. Brand new fighters join Cammy, Sagat, Hwoarang and Julia! Don't miss this chance to check out the action!

childDownloads.title: E3 2011 Trailer
childDownloads.description: A trailer shown at E3 2011. The dream match up becomes a reality in STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN! Many well-known fighters join Ryu and Kazuya in this heated battle! Check out the next combatants who will join the fray!

childDownloads.title: Abel (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Abel is rumored to have been captured by Seth, the CEO of S.I.N., and subjected to several experiments! Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Abel (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Rumor has it that in the hopes of one day stepping into the ring with Armor King, Abel puts in a special order for a new costume. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Additional Characters Pack (12 Chars)
childDownloads.description: 6 Street Fighter and 6 Tekken characters join the battle, for a total of 12 new fighters! Characters Included: Sakura, Blanka, Guy, Cody, Elena, Dudley, Lars, Alisa, JACK-X, Bryan, Christie, Lei Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. To use this content, update to "Street Fighter X Tekken" Ver.1.06.

childDownloads.title: Akuma (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: This fabled demon's armor from ancient times is a perfect fit for Akuma. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Akuma (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: While training under a waterfall, Akuma somehow takes on the appearance of Heihachi... Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Alisa (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Unbeknownst to all, Alisa can change her personalities by changing modes. This is apparently one of her additional personalities. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Alisa (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Rumor has it that after hearing that Juri is working together with M.Bison, Alisa disguised herself as Juri in the hopes of getting to the bottom of Shadaloo's recent activities. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Asuka (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: For her school's cultural festival, Asuka dresses up as one of the bad students for a performance. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Asuka (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: For a work-study program at school, Asuka was sent to a certain ninja village. Does Asuka have what it takes to learn the ninja arts from Ibuki?! Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Balrog (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: The battle for Pandora must be won at all costs. M.Bison has sent Balrog to the front lines to ensure Shadaloo's success. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Balrog (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Rumor has it that after defeating Steve in a fight, Balrog decided to dress up as him to further mock his fallen adversary. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Blanka (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: After a fight with Hwoarang, the two become friends. Rumor has it that Blanka decided to get some matching clothes as a token of appreciation. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Bob (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Invited to a costume party, Bob decides to go as a masked hero who stamps out evil in the name of justice. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Bob (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Rumor has it that Bob was impressed by Ryu's never-ending dedication to the fight. He decided to pay the original world warrior homage with a special outfit. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Bryan (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Apparently Bryan dons this outfit in the hopes of crashing an amusement park. If you weren't afraid of clowns before... Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Bryan (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Rumor has it that with his powers and abilities being recognized by Urien, the second in command of a mysterious organization, Bryan is brought into their ranks. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Cammy (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Cammy dresses for the occasion as she heads out with her friends to a rock concert. Even a disciplined soldier has to let her hair down once in a awhile. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Cammy (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Cammy shows off her love of cats with this leopard motif costume. It would seem that Cammy has become one of King's fans... Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Christie (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Christie was recruited to become a carnival dancer. This dynamic outfit is sure to shine when Christie starts doing her moves! Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Christie (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Brainwashed by M.Bison, the leader of Shadaloo, Christie becomes a member of Bison's special bodyguard unit, The Dolls... Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Chun-Li (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: Apparently this is what Chun-Li wears when she cooks at home. But... doesn't this outfit seem a bit too spicy for cooking at home alone!? Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Chun-Li (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: The First Lady of Fighting shows off a softer side with this adorable panda outfit. Fans of Chun-Li and pandas won't want to miss out! Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN.

childDownloads.title: Cody (Alternate)
childDownloads.description: To help in his latest prison escape, apparently Cody nabbed Edi.E's uniform to help him slip past the guards. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.

childDownloads.title: Cody (Swap Costume)
childDownloads.description: Rumor has it that Cody beat Paul in a money match, but after Paul came up short on funds he was forced to pay with the shirt off his back. Note: This add-on is exclusive content for STREET FIGHTER X TEKKEN. This add-on content can only be used if the additional character pack has been purchased.
